attributes.action: Make it compulsory for those who failed to vote in the EU referendum to vote.
attributes.additional_details:
This would be a much fairer appraisal of what the whole country really wants and may lead to a different outcome. 

We advise the government to perhaps carry out this supplementary vote by postal voting.
attributes.background: There was not a clear enough majority in the EU referendum. We would ask that the government makes it compulsory for the  none voters in this referendum (27.8% of the UK population) to vote.

rejection.details: Voting is anonymous in this country, so it's not clear how this would be possible.
